cards.name: Search
cards.desc: Find Coalesce entities matching your criteria.

cards.name: Editor
cards.desc: Edit or create new Coalesce entities.

cards.name: Enumerations
cards.desc: Create and edit enumerations used by Coalesce.

cards.name: Templates
cards.desc: Editor or create new templates for Coalesce entities.

cards.name: Map
cards.desc: Visualize different layers provided by a Geo Server fed from a Coalesce database.

cards.name: Manager
cards.desc: Visualize how the services within this container are wired together.

cards.name: REST API
cards.desc: View Coalesce's REST API to integrate your applications.

cards.name: Deployment
cards.desc: View how to deploy and run a Coalesce server.

cards.name: Source Code
cards.desc: Download and contribute to the open source project.
